Headline: #87 87th Temporary Reroute at 87th/Central Park
ShortDescription: 87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted via 87th, Southwest Highway, Lawndale and 87th: due to, street blockage near 87th/Central Park.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted via 87th, Southwest Highway, Lawndale and 87th: due to, street blockage near 87th/Central Park.

Headline: #79 79th Temporary Westbound Reroute near 79th/Cregier
ShortDescription: Westbound 79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, Jeffrey, 75th and Stony Island: due to, street blockage near 79th/Cregier.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, Jeffrey, 75th and Stony Island: due to, street blockage near 79th/Cregier.

Headline: Loop-bound Orange Line Delays
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Orange Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following earlier police activity at Western. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Orange Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following earlier police activity at Western.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
